howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in three simple steps

step1.title: Configure Connections
step1.description: Set up MCP server connections with secure credential management. Define your environments and organize resources by teams.

step2.title: Define Policies
step2.description: Create fine-grained security policies that control which agents can access which tools in specific environments.

step3.title: Execute & Monitor
step3.description: Run your agents with automatic policy enforcement, rate limiting, and comprehensive audit logging of all operations.

content.title: Why AgentxSuite for MCP Agent Management?
content.p1: AgentxSuite is an enterprise-grade platform designed specifically for orchestrating Model Context Protocol (MCP) agents at scale. Built with Django and modern web technologies, it provides a robust foundation for managing complex AI agent workflows with security and compliance in mind.
content.p2: The platform addresses critical challenges in AI agent management: secure credential storage with encrypted secret management, fine-grained access control through a flexible policy engine, comprehensive audit logging for compliance requirements, and real-time monitoring of agent performance and system health.
content.p3: Whether you're running a small team or managing thousands of agents across multiple environments, AgentxSuite scales with your needs. The multi-tenant architecture ensures complete isolation between organizations, while the flexible RBAC system allows you to define precise permissions for different team roles.
content.p4: Built on open standards and fully extensible, AgentxSuite integrates seamlessly with your existing infrastructure. Native MCP protocol support ensures compatibility with a wide range of AI models and services, while the RESTful API and webhook system enable custom integrations with your tools and workflows.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.text: Star us on GitHub and explore the documentation to begin orchestrating your AI agents today.
